metadata.title: CVE-2017-13776 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has a denial of service issue in ReadXBMImage() in acoders/xbm.c "Read hex image data" version!=10 case that results in thereader not returning; it would cause large amounts of CPU and memoryconsumption although the crafted file itself does not request it.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13776` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-8
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-8
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-8
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-8
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-8
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-8').
